DOC.criteria: meet chronic gastritis ( chronic superficial gastritis chronic atrophic gastritis ) diagnostic criterion ; age 1865 year old ; positive H. pylorus infection confirm two method different principle ( stop use PPI , H2RA , bismuth , antibiotic since two week examination ) ; patient informed consent willing accept correspond treatment . Exclusion criterion : Patients chronic atrophic gastritis severe dysplasia , upper gastrointestinal bleeding , peptic ulcer , gastrointestinal tumor ; digestive organic disease ( chronic pancreatitis , cirrhosis , etc . ) , systemic disease affect intestinal motility ( hyperthyroidism , diabetes mellitus , chronic renal insufficiency , mental , neurological disease , etc . ) ; accompany serious heart , liver major organ lesion , blood disease , cancer ( ALT , AST two time higher normal value ) ; take medicine might affect H. pylori detection result within two week ( antacid , H2RA , PPIs , bismuth antibiotic , etc . ) ; pregnant lactating woman ; patient history systematic neuropsychiatric disorder ; history drug allergy ; participate clinical trial .
